contents: <sup>1</sup>So why do people have “eureka” moments, and how can we have more of them? <sup>2</sup>A “eureka” moment is a moment of realization when the solution to a problem or a brilliant idea arrives seemingly out of nowhere. <sup>3</sup>The term originates from a story about Archimedes. <sup>4</sup>Archimedes was an ancient Greek scholar who discovered how to calculate the volume of irregular objects. <sup>5</sup>He discovered this one day while he was taking a bath. <sup>6</sup>_______________, he supposedly shouted “Eureka!” meaning “I have found it!”
